gurmukhi: Pyir auiTE kr lY krvwr ko cMf pRcMf isau ju`Du kirE hY ]
transliteration: Pher(i) Outhio Kar Lai Karvaar Ko Channd Prachanndd Sio Juddh(u) Kario Hai||
translation: The demon got up again and holding the sword in his hand he waged the war with powerful Chandi.

gurmukhi: Gwiel kY qn kyhr qy bih sRaun smUh Drwn pirE hY ]
transliteration: Ghaail Kai Tan Kehar Te Bah(i) Sraoun Samoond Dharaan Pario Hai||
translation: He wounded the lion, whose blood flowed enormously and fell upon the earth.

gurmukhi: so aupmw kib ny brnI mn kI hrnI iqh nwau DirE hY ]
transliteration: So Oupmaa Kab(i) Ne Barnoo Man Koo Harnoo Tih Naau Dhario Hai||
translation: The poet hath described this scence in a very attractive manner.

gurmukhi: gyrU ngM pr kY brKw DrnI pih mwnhu rMg FirE hY ]156]
transliteration: Geroo Nagad Par Kai Barkhaa Dharnoo Pah(i) Maanoh Ran Dhario Hai||156||
translation: According to him, the colour of the ochre-mountain is melting and falling on earth in the rainy season.156.

gurmukhi: sROxq ibMdu so cMf pRcMf su ju`Du kirE rn m`iD ruhylI ]
transliteration: Sraounat Bind(u) So Channd Prachanndd Su Juddh(u) Kario Ran Maddh(i) Reheloo||
translation: Filled with rage, Chandika waged a fierce war with Raktavija in the battlefield.

gurmukhi: pY pl mY dl mIj dieE iql qy ijmu qyl inkwrq qylI ]
transliteration: Pai Pal Maid Al Moond Daio Tilt E Jim(u) Tel Nikaarat Teloo||
translation: She pressed the army of the demons in an instant, just as the oilman presses the oil from the sesame seed.

gurmukhi: sRaux pirE DrnI pr cÍY rMgryj kI rynI ijau PUt kY PYlI ]
transliteration: Sraoun Pario Dharnoo Par Chvai Ranrej Koo Renoo Jio Phootkai Phailoo||
translation: The blood is dripping on the earth just as the dyer’s colour-vessel cracks and the colour spreads.

gurmukhi: Gwau lsY qn dYq ky XO jn dIpk m`iD PnUs kI QYlI ]157]
transliteration: Ghaau Lasai Tan Dait Key Au Jan Doopak Maddh(i) Phanoos Koo Thailoo||157||
translation: The wounds of the demons glitter like the lamps in the containers.157.

gurmukhi: sRauxq ibMd ko sRaux pirE Dir sRauxq ibMd Anyk Bey hY ]
transliteration: Sraounat Bind Ko Sraoun Pario Dhar(i) Sraounat Bind Anek Bhae Hai||
translation: Wherever the blood of Raktavija fell, many Raktavijas rose up there.

gurmukhi: cMif pRcMif kuvMif sMBwir kY bwnin swiQ sMGwr dey hY ]
transliteration: Channd(i) Prachanndd(i) Kuvand(i) Sanbdaar(i) Ai Baanan(i) Saath(i) Sanhaar Dae Hai||
translation: Chandi caught hold of her ferocious bow and killed all of them with her arrows.

gurmukhi: sRaun smUh smwie gey bhu ros Bey hiq Pyir ley hY ]
transliteration: Sraoun Samoond Samaae Gad Bahu Ros Bhae Hat(i) Pher(i) Lae Hai||
translation: Through all the new born Raktavijas were killed, still more Raktavijas rose up; Chandi killed all of them.

gurmukhi: bwrd Dwr prY DrnI mwno ibMbr hÍY imt kY ju gey hY ]158]
transliteration: Baarad Dhaar Darai Dharnoo Maano Binbar Hvai Mit Kai Ju Gad Hai||158||
translation: They all die and are reborn like bubbles produced by rain and then immediately becoming extinct.158.

gurmukhi: jyqk sRaun kI bUMd igrY rn qyqk sRaunq ibMd hÍY AweI ]
transliteration: Jetak Sraoun Koo Boond Girai Ran Tetak Sraounat Bind Hvai Aaoo||
translation: As many drops of blood of Raktavija fall on the ground, so many Raktavijas come into being.
